overview: Video iPad Converter converts almost all video format, e.g. DivX, XviD, MOV, rm, rmvb,dvr-ms, MPEG, WMV, AVI to iPad Movie / iPad Video format. Meanwhile, it can also support output almost any audio, e.g. AC3, AAC, MP2, MP3, MP4, RA, WMA, etc. You can enjoy your Audio/Video life with this all in one Video to iPad Converter from now on. And the output iPad video supports iPad screen, you can enjoy your favorite movie on your iPad as a MPEG-4 Player.
